Interface TaxCalculator

All Known Implementing Classes:
FedTaxCalculator
public interface TaxCalculator

An object that encapsulates the calculation of taxes based on the amount of money earned, the number of dependents and the number of pay periods in the year.

Method Summary
 Money calculateTaxes(Money pay, int allowances, int periods)
          Calculate and return the amount of tax to pay on the net amount of money earned in this pay cycle.
 

Method Detail

calculateTaxes

public Money calculateTaxes(Money pay,
                            int allowances,
                            int periods)
Calculate and return the amount of tax to pay on the net amount of money earned in this pay cycle.

Parameters:
pay - the gross earnings in this pay period
allowances - the number of dependents
periods - the number of pay periods per year
Returns:
the amount of tax owed on the gross pay
